# `ChangePasswordEvents`

```ts
type ChangePasswordEvents =
  | { type: 'REQUEST'; password: string; ticket: string }
  | { type: 'SUCCESS' }
  | { type: 'ERROR'; error: ErrorPayload | null }
```
